name: Prime
descriptions: Prime is a wasteland hacker found dead at Dot's Diner near the Jury Street Metro station in 2277. On his corpse, one can find the unique Xuanlong assault rifle.

After completing an unknown job with his partner Jiggs, Prime made a difficult journey to the Museum of Technology to stash Jiggs’ share of the loot for him to find. After easily hacking into several of the museum’s ancient terminals, Prime left behind a set of riddles on them that only Jiggs would be able to solve.
